name: Prompt Forge V3 Patreon Launch
description: Patreon release campaign for Prompt Forge v3 AI shot list tool

2026-02-10.x:
New tool dropping on Patreon soon.

Prompt Forge v3 turns your scripts into shot lists automatically. No more manual breakdowns.

I've been using the beta for 3 months. It's saved me probably 20 hours on the last video alone.

Link coming. #PromptForge #FILM426
2026-02-10.ig:

2026-02-11.x:
6 months of building Prompt Forge v3:

Started as a spreadsheet. Now it parses scripts, breaks them into shots, and exports directly to ComfyUI.

The UI still needs work (I'm not a designer) but the core functionality is solid.

Launching this week. #PromptForge
2026-02-11.ig:

Launching this week. #PromptForge

video.script: 6 months of building Prompt Forge v3. Started as a spreadsheet. Now it parses scripts, breaks them into shots, and exports directly to ComfyUI. The UI still needs work - I'm not a designer - but the core functionality is solid. Launching this week. #PromptForge

2026-02-15.x:
Weekend mission:

Find that script languishing in your drafts. Paste it into Prompt Forge v3. Watch the shot list generate.

I do this every Sunday. Clears the brain. Starts the week right.

Link in bio. #PromptForge #FILM426 #Belladonna

2026-02-18.x:
I almost didn't release Prompt Forge v3 publicly.

Thought it was too niche. Too technical. Who actually needs script-to-shot-list automation?

Then I used it for 3 months and saved 20+ hours. Changed how I work entirely.

Tomorrow's video explains why. #PromptForge

posts.name: Prompt Forge V3 YouTube Tutorial
posts.description: YouTube video release for Prompt Forge v3 tutorial

2026-02-15.x:
Stop typing camera angles and hoping for the best.

Prompt Forge v3 turns YOUR script into a shot list. Camera angles. Lighting. Motion. Export to ComfyUI.

The blank page problem is solved.

Watch: https://youtu.be/QLbvlku40hY

#PromptForge #ComfyUI #AIVideo
2026-02-15.ig:
I used to spend more time writing prompts than actually creating.

That's not directing. That's typing.

So I built a tool that does the heavy lifting. You paste your scriptâ€”dialogue, action lines, scene descriptions.

It gives you: Camera angles. Lighting setups. Motion prompts.

No more "cinematic wide shot" garbage.

This is what it looks like when you treat AI as a tool, not a magic box.

Prompt Forge v3 tutorial is live. Link in bio.

#PromptForge #FILM426 #ComfyUI #AIVideo

video.description: TikTok hook: Split screen - left shows generic AI output, right shows professional shot from Prompt Forge.
video.script: POV: You just pasted your script and got a professional shot list. This tool is insane. #PromptForge #ComfyUI #AIVideo
